visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis should have categories for each month from January to December. The y-axis should have labels styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333333. The chart should have three data series named 'First', 'Second', and 'Third', with corresponding data values. The series should use custom colors: ['#7cb5ec', '#434348', '#90ed7d']. The legend should be positioned at the bottom of the chart with horizontal layout, and the legend items should have a font size of 14px, bold font weight, and a color of #555555. The chart should have a white background and margins of 50px on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The x-axis is labeled with months from January to December, and the y-axis labels are styled with a font size of 12px and a color of #333333. The chart includes three data series named 'First', 'Second', and 'Third', each with corresponding data values and custom colors: '#7cb5ec', '#434348', and '#90ed7d'. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart with a horizontal layout, styled with a font size of 14px, bold font weight, and a color of #555555. The chart has a white background and margins of 50px on all sides to ensure proper spacing around the chart elements.
